articles.title: Music and acting worlds react to death of rapper DMX - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: American rapper and actor Earl Simmons, known by the stage name DMX or Dark Man X, died on Friday at age 50.

articles.title: Biden to announce all adults in US eligible for COVID-19 vaccine by Apr 19 - CNA
articles.description: US President Joe Biden will announce Tuesday that all adults across America can get Covid-19 vaccine shots within two weeks, sooner than expected, as the IMF boosted its forecast for world economic growth this year amid signs of a rebound from the pandemic.
